rules.name: betterFenceGatePlacement
rules.description: Make the placed fence gate have the same block status as the fence gate you clicked

rules.name: betterSignEditing
rules.description: Possible to use feather editing sign with "pen" in the name

rules.name: betterSignInteraction
rules.description: Make the block attached to the sign interact when you right-click it

rules.name: betterWoodStrip
rules.description: Only the axe with "Strip" in its name is allowed to peel logs

rules.name: fakePlayerAutoFish
rules.description: Make fake player to auto fish

rules.name: fakePlayerAutoReplaceTool
rules.description: Make fake player to auto replace almost damaged tool

rules.name: fakePlayerAutoReplenishment
rules.description: Make fake player to auto replenishment

rules.name: fakePlayerResident
rules.description: Keep the fake player when exiting the level

rules.name: openFakePlayerEnderChest
rules.description: Allow player to open the fake player's ender chest

rules.name: openFakePlayerInventory
rules.description: Allow player to open the fake player's inventory
